fixes.name: FACE T
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR useCustom = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR endDateParam = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    useCustom,
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Max Date] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Face],
        0
    ),
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate] = endDateParam,
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Face],
        0
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the nested Tableau IF structure to DAX IF. Parameter references were replaced with SELECTEDVALUE('ParameterName'[Display As]) as required. All field references were converted to the 'table'[column] format using the calculation's table name. Logical flow and returned values remain the same.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references parameters, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
